explanation_text:
Sol.
A:  It need not be true for a function which is decreasing.
B:  
An exponential function may be increasing or decreasing, so this condition may not always be true.
C:  
It always holds because if we square the input variable, then the highest order in the polynomial 
will also get squared.
D:  It is not true in cases when 
( )
f n
 is a polynomial function.
C Programming
